title: Retro Pixel
description: Une esthétique nostalgique de pixel art 16 bits rappelant les portraits de personnages de RPG classiques et les jeux indépendants. Elle présente des bords crénelés nets, une palette de couleurs limitée avec des ombrages en blocs et une structure de grille précise sans anticrénelage.
description_en: A nostalgic 16-bit pixel art aesthetic reminiscent of classic RPG character portraits and indie games. It features sharp aliased edges, a limited color palette with blocky shading, and a crisp grid-based structure without anti-aliasing.
description_fr: Une esthétique nostalgique de pixel art 16 bits rappelant les portraits de personnages de RPG classiques et les jeux indépendants. Elle présente des bords crénelés nets, une palette de couleurs limitée avec des ombrages en blocs et une structure de grille précise sans anticrénelage.
prompt: A high-quality pixel art representation of {{subject}}, rendered in a nostalgic 16-bit retro game aesthetic. The image features sharp, jagged aliased edges with absolutely no anti-aliasing, maintaining a crisp grid-based structure typical of classic RPG character portraits or visual novel sprites. The color palette is strictly limited and vibrant, dominated by {{primary_color}} tones for the main structural elements and {{accent_color}} for highlights and atmospheric details. Shading is achieved through distinct, blocky clusters of solid color rather than smooth gradients, creating a cel-shaded look with hard transitions between light and shadow. The lighting is flat but distinct, using hard-edged highlights to define volume and form. The texture is purely digital, mimicking a low-resolution screen display upscale. The composition isolates the subject like a game sprite, emphasizing silhouette and readable details. The style evokes a cozy, indie gaming mood with a focus on clean lines and pixel-perfect precision.
